title: Red Roses
description: The ultimate declaration of love and devotion, a sumptuous bouquet of 50 Sweetheart red roses (40 cm), the ideal romantic gift. Delivered by courier

title: Spring Hedgerow
description: A sweet pink rose is surrounded with sunny yellow chrysanthemum, soft pink alstroemeria and vibrant iris to create this stunning bouquet, sure to impress. Delivered in bud to prolong the freshness and the WOW factor

title: Blue Lagoon
description: This jubilant arrangement is skilfully hand tied by our talented florists with fragrant fresh lilies, eryngium, white and Reagan chrysanthemums and statice framed with beautiful palm leaf. Each bouquet is expertly hand tied especially for your recipient. Perfect for any occasion the bouquet will give your recipient that wow factor
